title: In.the.Realm.of.the.Senses.1976.1080p.Criterion.BD.x264-GCJM
description:
In.the.Realm.of.the.Senses.1976.1080p.Criterion.Bluray.DTS.x264-GCJM

=======

A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her
master led to a sexual obsession which then came to a violent end.

"Still censored in its own country, In the Realm of the Senses (Ai no corrida),
by Japanese director Nagisa Oshima, remains one of the most controversial films
of all time. A graphic portrayal of insatiable sexual desire, OshimaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s film, set
in 1936 and based on a true incident, depicts a man and a woman (Tatsuya Fuji
and Eiko Matsuda) consumed by a transcendent, destructive love while living in
an era of ever escalating imperialism and governmental control. Less a work of
pornography than of politics, In the Realm of the Senses is a brave,
taboo-breaking milestone.

WARNING: THIS FILM IS SEXUALLY EXPLICIT"
